options.name: logging-channel
options.description: Manage the channel for logging actions taken through the bot to

options.name: set
options.description: Set the channel for logging actions taken through the bot to

options.name: permissions
options.description: Manage bot level permissions. Requires being a manager on the bot.

options.name: manage
options.description: Manage and view the target's permissions

options.name: target
options.description: The user or role to manage / view permissions for

options.name: channel
options.description: The channel to manage / view permissions of the target on

options.name: quickstart
options.description: Get permissions setup with presets. Use the manage command to have finer control over permissions

options.name: target
options.description: The user or role to setup permissions for

options.name: channel
options.description: The channel to setup permissions of the target on

options.name: message-access
options.description: Grants permissions required to manage messages. Note: setting this to false won't deny permissions

options.name: management-access
options.description: Grants permissions required to manage bot setup. Note: setting this to false won't deny permissions

options.name: list
options.description: List all users and roles with bot permissions

options.name: channel
options.description: The channel to list the permissions on. Leave empty to list the permissions on the guild level.

name: send
description: Send a message via the bot

options.name: channel
options.description: Channel to send the message to

options.name: tag
options.description: The name of the information you are trying to find.
